title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, October 26, 2020
description: It's the birthday of the early American self-help writer Napoleon Hill (1883-1970), who wrote, "Do not wait: the time will never be 'just right.'"
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of the early American self-help writer Napoleon Hill (1883-1970), who wrote, "Do not wait: the time will never be 'just right.'"
